typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SOURCE_SYSTEM as string,
		SOURCE_KEY as string,
		PERSON_TECHID as string,
		TITLE as string,
		FNAME as string,
		MNAME as string,
		LNAME as string,
		NAMESUFFIX as string,
		FULL_NAME as string,
		DOB as date,
		GENDER as string,
		SSN as string,
		PRIMARY_ADDR_FLAG as string,
		SECONDARY_ADDR_FLAG as string,
		P_A_COUNTRY as string,
		P_A_MAILLINE1 as string,
		P_A_MAILLINE2 as string,
		P_A_CITY as string,
		P_A_STATE as string,
		P_A_POSTALCODE as string,
		P_ZIP_CODE5 as string,
		P_A_COUNTY as string,
		P_A_PHONE as string,
		P_A_CELLPHONE as string,
		P_A_FAX as string,
		P_A_TOLLFREENUMBER as string,
		P_A_EMAIL as string,
		S_A_COUNTRY as string,
		S_A_MAILLINE1 as string,
		S_A_MAILLINE2 as string,
		S_A_CITY as string,
		S_A_STATE as string,
		S_A_POSTALCODE as string,
		S_ZIP_CODE5 as string,
		S_A_COUNTY as string,
		S_A_PHONE as string,
		S_A_CELLPHONE as string,
		S_A_FAX as string,
		S_A_TOLLFREENUMBER as string,
		S_A_EMAIL as string,
		CHANGE_CODE as string,
		PERSON_CHECK_SUM as string,
		PERSONIDENT_CHECK_SUM as string,
		PERADDR_P_CHECK_SUM as string,
		PERADDR_S_CHECK_SUM as string,
		PERCONT_P_PH1_CHECK_SUM as string,
		PERCONT_P_PH2_CHECK_SUM as string,
		PERCONT_S_PH1_CHECK_SUM as string,
		PERCONT_P_EMAIL_CHECK_SUM as string,
		PERCONT_S_EMAIL_CHECK_SUM as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT \nSOURCE_SYSTEM,SOURCE_KEY,PERSON_TECHID,TITLE,FNAME,MNAME,LNAME,NAMESUFFIX,TRIM(CONCAT(LNAME,\', \',FNAME,\' \',MNAME)) AS FULL_NAME,CAST(DOB as date) AS DOB,GENDER,SSN,PRIMARY_ADDR_FLAG,SECONDARY_ADDR_FLAG,P_A_COUNTRY,P_A_MAILLINE1,P_A_MAILLINE2,\nP_A_CITY,P_A_STATE,P_A_POSTALCODE,P_ZIP_CODE5,P_A_COUNTY,P_A_PHONE,P_A_CELLPHONE,P_A_FAX,P_A_TOLLFREENUMBER,P_A_EMAIL,S_A_COUNTRY,S_A_MAILLINE1,S_A_MAILLINE2,S_A_CITY,S_A_STATE,S_A_POSTALCODE,S_ZIP_CODE5,S_A_COUNTY,S_A_PHONE,S_A_CELLPHONE,\nS_A_FAX,S_A_TOLLFREENUMBER,S_A_EMAIL,CHANGE_CODE,\nCONVERT(NVARCHAR(32),HashBytes(\'MD5\',ISNULL(TITLE,\'2\')+ISNULL(FNAME,\'3\')+ISNULL(MNAME,\'4\')+ISNULL(LNAME,\'6\')+ISNULL(NAMESUFFIX,\'7\')+ISNULL(DOB,\'8\')+ISNULL(GENDER,\'9\')+ISNULL(SSN,\'10\')+\nISNULL(P_A_COUNTRY,\'11\')+ISNULL(P_A_MAILLINE1,\'12\')+ISNULL(P_A_MAILLINE2,\'13\')+ISNULL(P_A_CITY,\'14\')+ISNULL(P_A_STATE,\'15\')+ISNULL(P_A_POSTALCODE,\'16\')+ISNULL(P_A_COUNTY,\'17\')+ISNULL(P_A_CELLPHONE,\'18\')+\nISNULL(P_A_EMAIL,\'20\')),2) PERSON_CHECK_SUM,\nCONVERT(NVARCHAR(32),HashBytes(\'MD5\',ISNULL(SSN,\'1\')),2) PERSONIDENT_CHECK_SUM,\nCONVERT(NVARCHAR(32),HashBytes(\'MD5\',ISNULL(P_A_COUNTRY,\'11\')+ISNULL(P_A_MAILLINE1,\'12\')+ISNULL(P_A_MAILLINE2,\'13\')+ISNULL(P_A_CITY,\'14\')+ISNULL(P_A_STATE,\'15\')+ISNULL(P_A_POSTALCODE,\'16\')+ISNULL(P_A_COUNTY,\'17\')),2) PERADDR_P_CHECK_SUM,\nCONVERT(NVARCHAR(32),HashBytes(\'MD5\',ISNULL(S_A_COUNTRY,\'21\')+ISNULL(S_A_MAILLINE1,\'22\')+ISNULL(S_A_MAILLINE2,\'23\')+ISNULL(S_A_CITY,\'24\')+ISNULL(S_A_STATE,\'25\')+ISNULL(S_A_POSTALCODE,\'26\')+ISNULL(S_A_COUNTY,\'27\')),2) PERADDR_S_CHECK_SUM,\nCONVERT(NVARCHAR(32),HashBytes(\'MD5\',ISNULL(P_A_CELLPHONE,\'19\')+\'PERSONAL\'+\'PHONE\'),2) PERCONT_P_PH1_CHECK_SUM,\nCONVERT(NVARCHAR(32),HashBytes(\'MD5\',ISNULL(P_A_PHONE,\'18\')+\'HOME\'+\'PHONE\'),2) PERCONT_P_PH2_CHECK_SUM,\nCONVERT(NVARCHAR(32),HashBytes(\'MD5\',ISNULL(S_A_CELLPHONE,\'29\')+\'OTHER\'+\'PHONE\'),2) PERCONT_S_PH1_CHECK_SUM,\nCONVERT(NVARCHAR(32),HashBytes(\'MD5\',ISNULL(P_A_EMAIL,\'20\')+\'PERSONAL\'+\'EMAIL\'),2) PERCONT_P_EMAIL_CHECK_SUM,\nCONVERT(NVARCHAR(32),HashBytes(\'MD5\',ISNULL(S_A_EMAIL,\'20\')+\'OTHER\'+\'EMAIL\'),2) PERCONT_S_EMAIL_CHECK_SUM\nFROM (\nSELECT SOURCE_SYSTEM,SOURCE_KEY,PERSON_TECHID,TITLE,FNAME,CASE WHEN MNAME1 IS NULL THEN MNAME2 ELSE MNAME1 END AS MNAME,LNAME,NAMESUFFIX,DOB,GENDER, SSN,\nCASE WHEN ISNULL(P_A_MAILLINE1,\'\') <> \'\' OR ISNULL(P_A_MAILLINE2,\'\') <> \'\' THEN \'Y\' ELSE \'N\' END AS PRIMARY_ADDR_FLAG,\nCASE WHEN ISNULL(S_A_MAILLINE1,\'\') <> \'\' OR ISNULL(S_A_MAILLINE2,\'\') <> \'\' THEN \'Y\' ELSE \'N\' END AS SECONDARY_ADDR_FLAG,\nP_A_COUNTRY,P_A_MAILLINE1,P_A_MAILLINE2,P_A_CITY,P_A_STATE,P_A_POSTALCODE,SUBSTRING(P_A_POSTALCODE,1,5) P_ZIP_CODE5,P_A_COUNTY,CASE WHEN ISNULL(P_A_CELLPHONE,\'\') = \'\' THEN P_A_PHONE ELSE P_A_CELLPHONE END AS P_A_CELLPHONE,\nCASE WHEN P_A_PHONE = P_A_CELLPHONE OR ISNULL(P_A_CELLPHONE,\'\') = \'\' THEN NULL ELSE P_A_PHONE END AS P_A_PHONE,P_A_FAX,P_A_TOLLFREENUMBER,P_A_EMAIL,S_A_COUNTRY,S_A_MAILLINE1,S_A_MAILLINE2,S_A_CITY,\nS_A_STATE,S_A_POSTALCODE,SUBSTRING(S_A_POSTALCODE,1,5) S_ZIP_CODE5,S_A_COUNTY,CASE WHEN ISNULL(S_A_CELLPHONE,\'\') = \'\' THEN S_A_PHONE ELSE S_A_CELLPHONE END S_A_CELLPHONE,\nCASE WHEN S_A_PHONE = S_A_CELLPHONE OR ISNULL(S_A_CELLPHONE,\'\') = \'\' THEN NULL ELSE S_A_PHONE END AS S_A_PHONE,S_A_FAX,S_A_TOLLFREENUMBER,\nCASE WHEN S_A_EMAIL = P_A_EMAIL THEN NULL ELSE S_A_EMAIL END AS S_A_EMAIL,UPPER(CHANGE_CODE) CHANGE_CODE\nFROM CMDM_STAGE.EB_MAX_DGTAL_PERSN_INFO_DELTA_STG ) T\n',
	format: 'query') ~> source1
source(output(
		prefix as string,
		FullName as string,
		firstName as string,
		middleName as string,
		lastName as string,
		suffix as string,
		gender as string,
		birthdate as date,
		birthPlace as string,
		srcPkey as string,
		sourceSystem as string,
		SSN as string,
		ITIN as string,
		driverLicense as string,
		primaryEmail as string,
		primeryPhone as string,
		streetAddress as string,
		primaryAddrLine1 as string,
		primaryAddrLine2 as string,
		primaryAddrLine3 as string,
		primaryAddrCity as string,
		primaryAddrState as string,
		primaryAddrPostalCode as string,
		countryCD as string,
		countyName as string,
		PostalCode5 as string,
		SourceDeletedInd as string,
		SourceStatus as string,
		row_status as string,
		batch_id as string,
		check_sum as string,
		createDateTime as timestamp,
		createdBy as string,
		lastUpdateDateTime as timestamp,
		lastUpdatedBy as string,
		SourceCreateDateTime as timestamp,
		SourceLastUpdateDateTime as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT * FROM CMDM_STAGE.PERSON WHERE sourceSystem=\'EB-MAX\'',
	format: 'query') ~> TgtPerson
source(output(
		SOURCE_SYSTEM as string,
		SOURCE_KEY as string,
		PERSON_TECHID as string,
		TITLE as string,
		FNAME as string,
		MNAME as string,
		LNAME as string,
		NAMESUFFIX as string,
		FULL_NAME as string,
		DOB as date,
		GENDER as string,
		SSN as string,
		PRIMARY_ADDR_FLAG as string,
		SECONDARY_ADDR_FLAG as string,
		P_A_COUNTRY as string,
		P_A_MAILLINE1 as string,
		P_A_MAILLINE2 as string,
		P_A_CITY as string,
		P_A_STATE as string,
		P_A_POSTALCODE as string,
		P_ZIP_CODE5 as string,
		P_A_COUNTY as string,
		P_A_PHONE as string,
		P_A_CELLPHONE as string,
		P_A_FAX as string,
		P_A_TOLLFREENUMBER as string,
		P_A_EMAIL as string,
		S_A_COUNTRY as string,
		S_A_MAILLINE1 as string,
		S_A_MAILLINE2 as string,
		S_A_CITY as string,
		S_A_STATE as string,
		S_A_POSTALCODE as string,
		S_ZIP_CODE5 as string,
		S_A_COUNTY as string,
		S_A_PHONE as string,
		S_A_CELLPHONE as string,
		S_A_FAX as string,
		S_A_TOLLFREENUMBER as string,
		S_A_EMAIL as string,
		CHANGE_CODE as string,
		PERSON_CHECK_SUM as string,
		PERSONIDENT_CHECK_SUM as string,
		PERADDR_P_CHECK_SUM as string,
		PERADDR_S_CHECK_SUM as string,
		PERCONT_P_PH1_CHECK_SUM as string,
		PERCONT_P_PH2_CHECK_SUM as string,
		PERCONT_S_PH1_CHECK_SUM as string,
		PERCONT_P_EMAIL_CHECK_SUM as string,
		PERCONT_S_EMAIL_CHECK_SUM as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT \nSOURCE_SYSTEM,SOURCE_KEY,PERSON_TECHID,TITLE,FNAME,MNAME,LNAME,NAMESUFFIX,TRIM(CONCAT(LNAME,\', \',FNAME,\' \',MNAME)) AS FULL_NAME,CAST(DOB as date) AS DOB,GENDER,SSN,PRIMARY_ADDR_FLAG,SECONDARY_ADDR_FLAG,P_A_COUNTRY,P_A_MAILLINE1,P_A_MAILLINE2,\nP_A_CITY,P_A_STATE,P_A_POSTALCODE,P_ZIP_CODE5,P_A_COUNTY,P_A_PHONE,P_A_CELLPHONE,P_A_FAX,P_A_TOLLFREENUMBER,P_A_EMAIL,S_A_COUNTRY,S_A_MAILLINE1,S_A_MAILLINE2,S_A_CITY,S_A_STATE,S_A_POSTALCODE,S_ZIP_CODE5,S_A_COUNTY,S_A_PHONE,S_A_CELLPHONE,\nS_A_FAX,S_A_TOLLFREENUMBER,S_A_EMAIL,CHANGE_CODE,\nCONVERT(NVARCHAR(32),HashBytes(\'MD5\',ISNULL(TITLE,\'2\')+ISNULL(FNAME,\'3\')+ISNULL(MNAME,\'4\')+ISNULL(LNAME,\'6\')+ISNULL(NAMESUFFIX,\'7\')+ISNULL(DOB,\'8\')+ISNULL(GENDER,\'9\')+ISNULL(SSN,\'10\')+\nISNULL(P_A_COUNTRY,\'11\')+ISNULL(P_A_MAILLINE1,\'12\')+ISNULL(P_A_MAILLINE2,\'13\')+ISNULL(P_A_CITY,\'14\')+ISNULL(P_A_STATE,\'15\')+ISNULL(P_A_POSTALCODE,\'16\')+ISNULL(P_A_COUNTY,\'17\')+ISNULL(P_A_CELLPHONE,\'18\')+\nISNULL(P_A_EMAIL,\'20\')),2) PERSON_CHECK_SUM,\nCONVERT(NVARCHAR(32),HashBytes(\'MD5\',ISNULL(SSN,\'1\')),2) PERSONIDENT_CHECK_SUM,\nCONVERT(NVARCHAR(32),HashBytes(\'MD5\',ISNULL(P_A_COUNTRY,\'11\')+ISNULL(P_A_MAILLINE1,\'12\')+ISNULL(P_A_MAILLINE2,\'13\')+ISNULL(P_A_CITY,\'14\')+ISNULL(P_A_STATE,\'15\')+ISNULL(P_A_POSTALCODE,\'16\')+ISNULL(P_A_COUNTY,\'17\')),2) PERADDR_P_CHECK_SUM,\nCONVERT(NVARCHAR(32),HashBytes(\'MD5\',ISNULL(S_A_COUNTRY,\'21\')+ISNULL(S_A_MAILLINE1,\'22\')+ISNULL(S_A_MAILLINE2,\'23\')+ISNULL(S_A_CITY,\'24\')+ISNULL(S_A_STATE,\'25\')+ISNULL(S_A_POSTALCODE,\'26\')+ISNULL(S_A_COUNTY,\'27\')),2) PERADDR_S_CHECK_SUM,\nCONVERT(NVARCHAR(32),HashBytes(\'MD5\',ISNULL(P_A_CELLPHONE,\'19\')+\'PERSONAL\'+\'PHONE\'),2) PERCONT_P_PH1_CHECK_SUM,\nCONVERT(NVARCHAR(32),HashBytes(\'MD5\',ISNULL(P_A_PHONE,\'18\')+\'HOME\'+\'PHONE\'),2) PERCONT_P_PH2_CHECK_SUM,\nCONVERT(NVARCHAR(32),HashBytes(\'MD5\',ISNULL(S_A_CELLPHONE,\'29\')+\'OTHER\'+\'PHONE\'),2) PERCONT_S_PH1_CHECK_SUM,\nCONVERT(NVARCHAR(32),HashBytes(\'MD5\',ISNULL(P_A_EMAIL,\'20\')+\'PERSONAL\'+\'EMAIL\'),2) PERCONT_P_EMAIL_CHECK_SUM,\nCONVERT(NVARCHAR(32),HashBytes(\'MD5\',ISNULL(S_A_EMAIL,\'20\')+\'OTHER\'+\'EMAIL\'),2) PERCONT_S_EMAIL_CHECK_SUM\nFROM (\nSELECT SOURCE_SYSTEM,SOURCE_KEY,PERSON_TECHID,TITLE,FNAME,CASE WHEN MNAME1 IS NULL THEN MNAME2 ELSE MNAME1 END AS MNAME,LNAME,NAMESUFFIX,DOB,GENDER, SSN,\nCASE WHEN ISNULL(P_A_MAILLINE1,\'\') <> \'\' OR ISNULL(P_A_MAILLINE2,\'\') <> \'\' THEN \'Y\' ELSE \'N\' END AS PRIMARY_ADDR_FLAG,\nCASE WHEN ISNULL(S_A_MAILLINE1,\'\') <> \'\' OR ISNULL(S_A_MAILLINE2,\'\') <> \'\' THEN \'Y\' ELSE \'N\' END AS SECONDARY_ADDR_FLAG,\nP_A_COUNTRY,P_A_MAILLINE1,P_A_MAILLINE2,P_A_CITY,P_A_STATE,P_A_POSTALCODE,SUBSTRING(P_A_POSTALCODE,1,5) P_ZIP_CODE5,P_A_COUNTY,CASE WHEN ISNULL(P_A_CELLPHONE,\'\') = \'\' THEN P_A_PHONE ELSE P_A_CELLPHONE END AS P_A_CELLPHONE,\nCASE WHEN P_A_PHONE = P_A_CELLPHONE OR ISNULL(P_A_CELLPHONE,\'\') = \'\' THEN NULL ELSE P_A_PHONE END AS P_A_PHONE,P_A_FAX,P_A_TOLLFREENUMBER,P_A_EMAIL,S_A_COUNTRY,S_A_MAILLINE1,S_A_MAILLINE2,S_A_CITY,\nS_A_STATE,S_A_POSTALCODE,SUBSTRING(S_A_POSTALCODE,1,5) S_ZIP_CODE5,S_A_COUNTY,CASE WHEN ISNULL(S_A_CELLPHONE,\'\') = \'\' THEN S_A_PHONE ELSE S_A_CELLPHONE END S_A_CELLPHONE,\nCASE WHEN S_A_PHONE = S_A_CELLPHONE OR ISNULL(S_A_CELLPHONE,\'\') = \'\' THEN NULL ELSE S_A_PHONE END AS S_A_PHONE,S_A_FAX,S_A_TOLLFREENUMBER,\nCASE WHEN S_A_EMAIL = P_A_EMAIL THEN NULL ELSE S_A_EMAIL END AS S_A_EMAIL,UPPER(CHANGE_CODE) CHANGE_CODE\nFROM CMDM_STAGE.EB_MAX_DGTAL_PERSN_INFO_DELTA_STG ) T\n',
	format: 'query') ~> source3
SourceDeleteInd derive(SourceCreateDateTime = currentTimestamp(),
		SourceLastUpdateDateTime = currentTimestamp(),
		row_status = 'A',
		Batchid = 100,
		Lastupdatetime = currentTimestamp()) ~> derivedColumn1
Doesntexists1 derive(SourceDeletedInd = case(CHANGE_CODE=='DELETE', 'Y','N')) ~> SourceDeleteInd
derivedColumn1 alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> Insert
filter1, TgtPerson exists(PERSON_CHECK_SUM != check_sum,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Doesntexists1
source1 filter(CHANGE_CODE=='NEW') ~> filter1
source3, TgtPerson exists(PERSON_CHECK_SUM == check_sum,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> exists1
split2@ChangecodeUpdated derive(Row_Status = 'A',
		Batch_Id = 101,
		LastUpdatedTime = currentTimestamp(),
		SrcInd = 'N') ~> derivedColumn4
derivedColumn4 alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> Updated
filter2 split(CHANGE_CODE=='UPDATE',
	CHANGE_CODE=='DELETE',
	disjoint: true) ~> split2@(ChangecodeUpdated, ChangecodeDeleted)
split2@ChangecodeDeleted derive(Row_Status = 'A',
		SrcDInd = 'Y',
		LastUpdatedTime = currentTimestamp(),
		Batch_id = 103) ~> derivedColumn6
derivedColumn6 alterRow(deleteIf(true())) ~> Delete
exists1 filter(CHANGE_CODE=='UPDATE') ~> filter2
Delete sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		prefix as string,
		FullName as string,
		firstName as string,
		middleName as string,
		lastName as string,
		suffix as string,
		gender as string,
		birthdate as date,
		birthPlace as string,
		srcPkey as string,
		sourceSystem as string,
		SSN as string,
		ITIN as string,
		driverLicense as string,
		primaryEmail as string,
		primeryPhone as string,
		streetAddress as string,
		primaryAddrLine1 as string,
		primaryAddrLine2 as string,
		primaryAddrLine3 as string,
		primaryAddrCity as string,
		primaryAddrState as string,
		primaryAddrPostalCode as string,
		countryCD as string,
		countyName as string,
		PostalCode5 as string,
		SourceDeletedInd as string,
		SourceStatus as string,
		row_status as string,
		batch_id as string,
		check_sum as string,
		createDateTime as timestamp,
		createdBy as string,
		lastUpdateDateTime as timestamp,
		lastUpdatedBy as string,
		SourceCreateDateTime as timestamp,
		SourceLastUpdateDateTime as timestamp
	),
	deletable:true,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['srcPkey'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		prefix = TITLE,
		FullName = FULL_NAME,
		firstName = FNAME,
		middleName = MNAME,
		lastName = LNAME,
		suffix = NAMESUFFIX,
		gender = GENDER,
		birthdate = DOB,
		srcPkey = SOURCE_KEY,
		sourceSystem = SOURCE_SYSTEM,
		SSN,
		primaryEmail = P_A_EMAIL,
		primeryPhone = P_A_CELLPHONE,
		primaryAddrLine1 = P_A_MAILLINE1,
		primaryAddrLine2 = P_A_MAILLINE2,
		primaryAddrCity = P_A_CITY,
		primaryAddrState = P_A_STATE,
		primaryAddrPostalCode = P_A_POSTALCODE,
		countryCD = P_A_COUNTRY,
		PostalCode5 = P_ZIP_CODE5,
		SourceDeletedInd = SrcDInd,
		row_status = Row_Status,
		batch_id = Batch_id,
		check_sum = PERSON_CHECK_SUM,
		lastUpdateDateTime = LastUpdatedTime
	)) ~> PersonDelete
Updated sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		prefix as string,
		FullName as string,
		firstName as string,
		middleName as string,
		lastName as string,
		suffix as string,
		gender as string,
		birthdate as date,
		birthPlace as string,
		srcPkey as string,
		sourceSystem as string,
		SSN as string,
		ITIN as string,
		driverLicense as string,
		primaryEmail as string,
		primeryPhone as string,
		streetAddress as string,
		primaryAddrLine1 as string,
		primaryAddrLine2 as string,
		primaryAddrLine3 as string,
		primaryAddrCity as string,
		primaryAddrState as string,
		primaryAddrPostalCode as string,
		countryCD as string,
		countyName as string,
		PostalCode5 as string,
		SourceDeletedInd as string,
		SourceStatus as string,
		row_status as string,
		batch_id as string,
		check_sum as string,
		createDateTime as timestamp,
		createdBy as string,
		lastUpdateDateTime as timestamp,
		lastUpdatedBy as string,
		SourceCreateDateTime as timestamp,
		SourceLastUpdateDateTime as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['srcPkey','batch_id'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		prefix = TITLE,
		FullName = FULL_NAME,
		firstName = FNAME,
		middleName = MNAME,
		lastName = LNAME,
		suffix = NAMESUFFIX,
		gender = GENDER,
		birthdate = DOB,
		srcPkey = SOURCE_KEY,
		sourceSystem = SOURCE_SYSTEM,
		SSN,
		primaryEmail = P_A_EMAIL,
		primeryPhone = P_A_CELLPHONE,
		primaryAddrLine1 = P_A_MAILLINE1,
		primaryAddrLine2 = P_A_MAILLINE2,
		primaryAddrCity = P_A_CITY,
		primaryAddrState = P_A_STATE,
		primaryAddrPostalCode = P_A_POSTALCODE,
		countryCD = P_A_COUNTRY,
		PostalCode5 = P_ZIP_CODE5,
		row_status = Row_Status,
		batch_id = Batch_Id,
		check_sum = PERSON_CHECK_SUM,
		lastUpdateDateTime = LastUpdatedTime
	)) ~> PersonUpdate
Insert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		prefix as string,
		FullName as string,
		firstName as string,
		middleName as string,
		lastName as string,
		suffix as string,
		gender as string,
		birthdate as date,
		birthPlace as string,
		srcPkey as string,
		sourceSystem as string,
		SSN as string,
		ITIN as string,
		driverLicense as string,
		primaryEmail as string,
		primeryPhone as string,
		streetAddress as string,
		primaryAddrLine1 as string,
		primaryAddrLine2 as string,
		primaryAddrLine3 as string,
		primaryAddrCity as string,
		primaryAddrState as string,
		primaryAddrPostalCode as string,
		countryCD as string,
		countyName as string,
		PostalCode5 as string,
		SourceDeletedInd as string,
		SourceStatus as string,
		row_status as string,
		batch_id as string,
		check_sum as string,
		createDateTime as timestamp,
		createdBy as string,
		lastUpdateDateTime as timestamp,
		lastUpdatedBy as string,
		SourceCreateDateTime as timestamp,
		SourceLastUpdateDateTime as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		prefix = TITLE,
		FullName = FULL_NAME,
		firstName = FNAME,
